attributes.additional_details:
I would like to ask for more support for children and adult with fetal alcohol syndrome, especially when they leave school, as their is no support for them at all.

These people have learning difficulties, and they have trouble with social skills etc.   There should be more help through social services etc for them.  They are expected to go to college or get jobs, and have trouble doing both.

We have schools for people with learning difficulties, but after this they are expected to mingle with people of normal abilities which is incredibly hard for them.  They should have colleges especially for these people to continue there life to the best of their ability.
